short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eBird is already pretty great. But a few pages have data that I need to download. This extension lets you do that.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to download data in a structured format (CSV) from certain eBird pages â€” currently Targets and Alerts.

(Note that this extension is NOT created or affiliated with eBird or Cornell. It's just my attempt to make a couple pages more useful for myself and figured others might like the same.)
